name: Parippu (Red Lentil Curry)
description: Simple red lentil curry, daily staple
instructions: Boil with water and turmeric until soft
For tempering: heat oil, add cumin
Add curry leaves, onions, chilies (Curry leaves must be fresh for authentic taste)
cultural_notes: Eaten daily with rice, essential Sri Lankan dish
description_sinhala: සරල රතු පරිප්පු ව්‍යංජනය, දෛනික ප්‍රධාන ආහාරය
description_tamil: எளிய சிவப்பு பருப்பு கறி, தினசரி முக்கிய உணவு
cultural_notes_sinhala: ශ්‍රී ලංකාවේ අත්‍යවශ්‍ය ආහාරයක් වන බත් සමඟ දිනපතා අනුභව කරනු ලැබේ
cultural_notes_tamil: இலங்கையின் அத்தியாவசிய உணவான அரிசியுடன் தினமும் சாப்பிடலாம்
